about_the_game:
Dive into "Liminal" – an enthralling adventure set in a world where the boundaries between reality and dreams blur. In this mysterious and unexpected journey, you find yourself in a strange and distorted place after an encounter with a mysterious creature in your own home. Your task is to explore surreal liminal spaces, solve puzzles, and uncover secrets to find your way back to the real world.

Every corner of this world hides something unique: from upside-down rooms to endless corridors, where each detail might be the key to unraveling the mystery. Your journey will be full of surprises and encounters with the unknown, where each step could reveal something new.

Are you ready to wake up and discover the truth?
detailed_description:
Dive into "Liminal" – an enthralling adventure set in a world where the boundaries between reality and dreams blur. In this mysterious and unexpected journey, you find yourself in a strange and distorted place after an encounter with a mysterious creature in your own home. Your task is to explore surreal liminal spaces, solve puzzles, and uncover secrets to find your way back to the real world.

Every corner of this world hides something unique: from upside-down rooms to endless corridors, where each detail might be the key to unraveling the mystery. Your journey will be full of surprises and encounters with the unknown, where each step could reveal something new.

Are you ready to wake up and discover the truth?
name: Wake Up: Liminal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8300H or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 Ti or better
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: How far are you willing to go?
